Trailer - Photos - IMDb

‎2hr 40min‎‎ - Rated PG-13‎‎ - Action/Adventure/Suspense/Thriller/Scifi/Fantasy‎
"Avatar" is the story of an ex-Marine who finds himself thrust into hostilities on an alien planet filled with exotic life forms. As an Avatar, a human mind in an alien body, he finds himself torn between two worlds, in a desperate fight more »for his own survival and that of the indigenous people. « less
